text: Egidio Cosentino (6 March 1927 â€“ 15 November 2020) was an Italian field hockey player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was born in Genoa, Italy. Cosentino died on 15 November 2020 in Calgary, Alberta at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Field hockey players Category:Olympians for Italy
title: Egidio Cosentino
